HiddenText.Name: Wellness Coordinator
HiddenText.BodyCopy:
Coordinators

Coordinators provide leadership and feedback to Managers and Volunteers. They help them publicize and promote their events.

Leadership Role

Coordinators work with individual program managers to help organize and direct their needs. They help managers inform students about upcoming events and invite them to participate. This position requires coordination with Student Managers and Student Directors. The majority of their time will be spent helping managers prepare for their events. Coordinators report directly to the Wellness Student Director.

Coordinator roles exist for the following:

Publicity Coordinator - oversees managers within publicity - creating posters and event promotions

Web Coordinator

Brain Honey Coordinator

Biggest Winner Coordinator

Fitness Class Instruction Coordinator

Fitness Consultant Coordinator

Programs and Events Coordinator
